content:
Have started building Terminology Server (using HAPI as a base). I've started building the $lookup an mimicking calls from this site. http://fhir2.healthintersections.com.au/tx?op=find&system=http%3A%2F%2Fsnomed.info%2Fsct&version=&code=206187005 but I'm after code and display term for the parent/child codes. I've followed this page https://hl7.org/fhir/2017Jan/operation-codesystem-lookup.html and come up with this. Is this correct??

<Parameters xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
<parameter>
<name value="display"/>
<valueString value="Birth trauma, asphyxia and hypoxia (navigational concept)"/>
</parameter>
<parameter>
<name value="parent.code"/>
<valueString value="363743006"/>
</parameter>
<parameter>
<name value="parent.description"/>
<valueString value="Navigational concept (navigational concept)"/>
</parameter>
</Parameters>
and shortly after posting I realise I've mixed versions.... Should have used this http://fhir3.healthintersections.com.au/tx?op=find&system=http%3A%2F%2Fsnomed.info%2Fsct&version=&code=206187005

Which is right, I suppose, depends on your purposes, but I would expect that the "fhir3" (STU3) endpoint of Grahame's server is what you will want to be looking at, rather than the DSTU2 version, since there have been some substantive changes and we'll be publishing STU3 officially very soon.
thanks, have gone with stu3. Now trying to decipher SNOMED (more can't see the wood for the trees at the moment)
